name: react-component-generator
description: Quickly create React components with TypeScript

reactComponentGenerator.componentTemplat.markdownDescription: Template for the component file. Use `{ComponentName}` placeholder.

reactComponentGenerator.indexTemplate.markdownDescription: Template for index file. Use `{ComponentName}` placeholder.

reactComponentGenerator.fileExtension.markdownDescription: File extension for the generated component file.

reactComponentGenerator.createIndexFile.markdownDescription: Whether to create an index file alongside the component.

reactComponentGenerator.componentTemplat.markdownDescription: Absolute or workspace-relative path to a file whose contents will be used as the component template. If provided, this takes precedence over `componentTemplate`.

reactComponentGenerator.indexTemplatePat.markdownDescription: Absolute or workspace-relative path to a file whose contents will be used as the index template. If provided, this takes precedence over `indexTemplate`.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
